Package de.systemagmbh.interfaces.message

Interface Summary
ISysIndexableMessage This extends the base of all messages with access methods by indices.
ISysMessage This is the base for all messages.
ISysMessageConvertable All classes that implement this interface can become a ISysMessage.
ISysMessageItem This is the base for all message items.
ISysMessageItemRenderer All message items implementing this interface can convert to a String.
ISysMessageRenderer All messages implementing this interface can convert to a String.
ISysVariableValue Messages or renderers supporting this interface are capable of variable values.
ISysVariableValueMessage If the message supports variable values, this interface must be implemented.
ISysVariableValueMessageItem If the message item supports variable values, this interface must be implemented.
 

Class Summary
FSysMessage Creates an instance of ISysMessage.
 

Exception Summary
CSysItemTypeException This exception is thrown when an unknown type is detected.
CSysMessageException This is the base exception for messages.
CSysParseException This exception is thrown if a String can not be parsed to a ISysMessage.
